body.why: Capture the net-new, high-leverage system lessons from multi-LLM plan comparison; lock the correct build order and guardrails; reduce mobile project-file ambiguity.

top_changes.title: Phase 0 must be 'Action/Governance Contract' not 'Webview capabilities'
top_changes.what: Implement ActionPlan schema + PROPOSE→PREVIEW→APPROVE→EXECUTE→RECEIPT state machine + chained receipts + deterministic replay on fixtures before touching real sites/APIs.
top_changes.why_it_matters: Everything else (perception, APIs, automation) becomes safer, testable, and composable; prevents 'silent autonomy' regression.
acceptance_tests: Replay reproduces final-state hash on fixtures
No execution IPC path exists from renderer

top_changes.title: Use API-first for Google Workspace; 'typing feel' = diff/patch UX
top_changes.what: Explicitly forbid DOM automation for Docs/Sheets as primary path; implement API-based diffs + user-mediated apply/patch for unsupported edits.
top_changes.why_it_matters: Avoids ToS traps + weekly patching; maintains trust and sustainability.
acceptance_tests: All Google actions are API calls or user-mediated apply

top_changes.title: Privilege isolation: camera-like perception + write-only action runner
top_changes.what: Separate Perception (read-only, sanitized) from Action Runner (whitelisted interpreter); never execute arbitrary JS from model output.
top_changes.why_it_matters: Stops prompt-injection and 'AI writes JS → run it' compromise class.
acceptance_tests: Action runner accepts only validated action types
Governance rejects any plan containing raw JS payloads

top_changes.title: Selector-rot policy: blessed origins + accessibility anchors + rot telemetry
top_changes.what: DOM-first actions only on a small whitelist; target elements via accessibility roles/names, not brittle CSS; log rot incidents and enforce a weekly rot threshold.
top_changes.why_it_matters: Meets 'no weekly patching' constraint by design.
acceptance_tests: Fallbacks exist (ask user / API / apply patch)

top_changes.title: Mobile file discoverability: frontloaded filenames + sentinel+index canonical map
top_changes.what: Project files must be identifiable from the first ~15–20 chars; keep a sentinel + index as the source of truth.
top_changes.why_it_matters: Fixes the mobile friction where file list truncation hides meaning.
acceptance_tests: In mobile list, each file is distinguishable
Sentinel names the exact 3–5 active files

best_unique_contribution_by_llm.biggest_value: Explicit 'never run arbitrary JS' + treat Action Runner as a whitelisted interpreter; cryptographically chained receipts; replay engine as trust primitive.
Framed as 'Intelligence Harness' with Governance Spine as single point of truth; emphasized policy-driven control plane first.
Concrete Electron implementation hooks (webContents/BrowserView, capturePage, debugger/CDP) and pragmatic phased deliverables.
Maintainability doctrine: reject weekly patching; commit to API-first + diff/apply flows; high-signal Phase 0 milestone definition.
Hard/soft blocker distinction and candid realism about illusion vs production; prompted 'FrictionHunter' concept for finding real-world breakages.

ranking_worst_to_best.name: Generic feasibility table (without shell ownership clarification)
ranking_worst_to_best.why_worst: Assumed Chrome-extension limits; underestimates what owning the webview enables.

ranking_worst_to_best.name: Early Grok feasibility (pre-clarification)
ranking_worst_to_best.why: Over-emphasized 'illusion' and ToS blockers before the shell framing.

ranking_worst_to_best.name: Claude architecture writeup
ranking_worst_to_best.why: Strong practicality, but still too optimistic about DOM editing for complex SaaS (Docs) without making API-only path non-negotiable.

ranking_worst_to_best.name: Gemini Intelligence Harness
ranking_worst_to_best.why: Best control-plane clarity; less concrete on implementation wiring.

ranking_worst_to_best.name: DeepSeek/Copilot clean-room interpreter plan
ranking_worst_to_best.why: Security posture is strongest; replay + signed logs are differentiators.

ranking_worst_to_best.name: MetaBlooms Blueprint v2 (current)
ranking_worst_to_best.why_best: Combines governance contract, isolation model, API-first strategy, rot thresholds, and explicit kill criteria aligned with your constraints.
